entry.title: $pypl is toast. Not sure theres much terminal value in charging 3.5% for automatic entry of credit card informationâ€¦
entry.summary:
$pypl is toast. Not sure theres much terminal value in charging 3.5% for automatic entry of credit card informationâ€¦
Not Tiger Global:â€‚Some think Apple Pay hasn't been killing $PYPL for years. Numbers don't lie. People lie. Apple Pay TPV: $6T $PYPL TPV: $1.5T Apply Pay Users: 507M $PYPL Users: 432M Not a call on either stock. Making a point. I don't make the rules. $PYPL -80% isn't "the market is dumb."
